newsitem.title: RUSSIA: BOXING-RUSSIAN PALIANI SEEKS NEW NATIONALITY -- AGAIN.
newsitem.headline: BOXING-RUSSIAN PALIANI SEEKS NEW NATIONALITY -- AGAIN.

text.p: Ramazi Paliani, who won the 60 kg bronze at the 1992 Olympics under the colours of the former Soviet Union and became 1996 European champion as a Russian after a brief spell boxing for Georgia, now wants yet another passport.
Paliani recently moved to Athens from Moscow and is seeking Greek citizenship and a place on the Greek team.
If he is allowed to compete for Greece at the World Championships in Budapest in October it is believed he would become the only boxer in history to represent so many different countries.
